comments.body: `choices=['sync', 'eventlet', 'gevent', 'tornado'],` We can constrain this since those are the only options.

comments.body:
Should we `help=argparse.SUPPRESS`?

I was almost thinking about removing `resetdb` altogether as we are growing our user base beyond control at Airbnb.
